column4: hi there - my current pidgin version (2.4.1) is too old according to ICQ,  I see there's a more recent version but I can't seem to get it with Ubuntu 8.04 :(
2.4.1 is latest on repos, but you can compile latest version from source, sudo apt-get build-dep pidgin, then download source and compile
You might better wait for !icqbug solution
